title: [SOLVED]820-00840 burned wifi area and no backligt - need help identifying parts and ratings
message:
[PLAIN][SOLVED]820-00840 burned wifi area and no backligt - need help identifying parts and ratings[/PLAIN]

Hi.

This A1708 came in totally dead with liquid damage. The wifi chip had been on fire so I pulled it and cleaned the area. After that it starts but obviously wifi is not working at the moment. And it is also missing backlight and I do not think this is related to the affected area, but I don't know as I can not find any schematics for this one...

Can someone help with identifying the missing parts on the pictures? And anyone have knowledge of the backlight circuit in these ones ?

Thanks

title: [SOLVED]820-00840 burned wifi area and no backligt - need help identifying parts and ratings
message: You can't get WiFi chips anyway and they are tied to the BIOS I think. Backlight circuit is similar to the 4924 boards, got to trace it out yourself.

title: [SOLVED]820-00840 burned wifi area and no backligt - need help identifying parts and ratings
message: Thanks for the hint regarding the 4924 backlight similarities. This is now working. The WiFi thing is just Apple bullshit ...

title: [SOLVED]820-00840 burned wifi area and no backligt - need help identifying parts and ratings
message: I believe the MAC address and some other shit is stored inside the WiFi chip. You may get away if you get one from a donor, a new one will probably not work.

title: [SOLVED]820-00840 burned wifi area and no backligt - need help identifying parts and ratings
message: Ok. Thanks. I probably leave it like it is. They can use a USB WiFi adapter hanging out as a reminder not keeping any water near by.
